actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging (Labor and Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to require that certain information relating to nursing home nurse aides and home health care aides be collected by the National Center for Health Statistics and the Bureau of Labor Statistics, and for other purposes.
short_title: Long-Term Health Care Workers Information Act

summary.text: Long-Term Health Care Workers Information Act - Requires the Director of the National Center for Health Statistics to collect information and prepare a report containing demographic information on home health care aides and nursing home aides and the locations in which they are employed. Requires the Commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect information and prepare a report on both kinds of aides containing specified types of information relating to conditions of employment and to employment benefits. Requires the Commissioner to include an occupational code for each kind of aide in each wage survey conducted by the Bureau.

titles.title: Long-Term Health Care Workers Information Act

A bill to require that certain information relating to nursing home nurse aides and home health care aides be collected by the National Center for Health Statistics and the Bureau of Labor Statistics, and for other purposes.
